name: ShopBuilder – Elementor WooCommerce Builder Addons
author: RadiusTheme

sections.description:
ShopBuilder is a powerful WooCommerce Builder for Elementor that lets you easily create custom WooCommerce pages with a drag and drop interface. ShopBuilder also includes a powerful set of WooCommerce widgets that lets you easily add products to your pages.

Elementor WooCommerce Builder Addons is an add-on plugin that integrates with both Elementor and WooCommerce, providing additional design options and functionality specifically for WooCommerce stores. By using this plugin, users can easily create custom-designed product pages, checkout pages, and other e-commerce-related pages.

👉 Plugin Demo | Documentation | Get Pro 👈

With ShopBuilder, you can craft captivating and highly functional online shopping experiences.

🏆 ShopBuilder Elementor WooCommerce Builder Features

👉 84+ Widgets
👉 11+ Modules – Quick View, Compare, Wishlist, Variation Swatches, Variation Gallery, Sales Notification, Mini Cart, Quick Checkout,
👉 16+ Page Templates Build
👉 32+ Pre-Built Templates
👉 Build WooCommerce pages like Shop, Single, Cart, Archive pages etc.
👉 Category Specific Archive Page
👉 Product Specific Detail Page
👉 AJAX Product Filter
👉 AJAX Load More Pagination
👉 Enable/ Disable module or widget for best performance
👉 Multi-Language Support
👉 Import predefined beautiful layouts for WooCommerce pages
👉 Compatible with popular themes
👉 Easy to provide compatibility with custom themes
👉 Easily override any templates and widgets behavior

🏆 Included Modules

👉 Quick View Module

The WooCommerce Quick View module is a tool or feature that enhances the functionality of an online store built with WooCommerce, a popular e-commerce plugin for WordPress. The primary purpose of this module is to provide a quick and convenient way for customers to preview product details without leaving the main shop or product listing page.

👉 Products Compare Module

Enabling your customers to easily compare products at their convenience is a straightforward process thanks to the Product Comparison Module.

This module enhances the functionality of an online store by providing customers with the ability to compare multiple products side by side.The module typically creates a comparison table where customers can view and compare detailed information about multiple products simultaneously.

👉 Wishlist Module

The Wishlist Module allows customers to create personalized collections of products they want to buy and save them in their user account for future reference. Wishlists signify a customer’s interest in a product without an immediate intent to purchase. It will greatly improve the customer’s shopping experience.

The WooCommerce Wishlist module enhances the customer experience by providing a convenient way to save and track desired products. It helps increase user engagement and can potentially lead to higher sales, as customers are more likely to return and make purchases when they have an organized and accessible list of their preferred items.

👉 Variation Swatches The Variation Swatches plugin converts the product variation select fields into radio, images, colors, and labels. By using this Variation swatches for WooCommerce Plugin, you can display your product variation attributes in images, colors, and label.

The Variation Swatches for Woocommerce plugin comes with a seperate plugin.

👉 Variation Gallery Variation Gallery for WooCommerce plugin give you the opportunity to showcase additional images as gallery for each product variation. This plugin allows you to upload unlimited additional images for each variation.

The Variation Swatches for Woocommerce plugin comes with a seperate plugin.

👉 Sales Notification [PRO]

This module is designed to display real-time notifications of recent sales activities on the website. The module displays pop-up or on-page notifications in real-time, notifying visitors of recent purchases made by other customers. These notifications often include details like product name, image, and the name or location of the customer who made the purchase.

WooCommerce Sales Notification modules are used to create a dynamic and engaging shopping experience for customers. By showcasing recent sales, these modules can build trust, create a sense of urgency, and encourage visitors to make purchases. They are a valuable tool for boosting conversion rates and increasing sales in online stores.

👉 Flash Sale Countdown [PRO]

The “Flash Sale Countdown” module for WooCommerce adds a sense of urgency and excitement to an e-commerce website built with WooCommerce. The Flash Sale Countdown module for WooCommerce is an effective tool for boosting sales and engaging customers by creating a sense of limited-time opportunity. It helps online store owners leverage flash sales as a marketing strategy to attract and convert customers, ultimately increasing revenue and promoting a dynamic shopping experience.

👉 Mini Cart [PRO]

The WooCommerce Mini Cart module is a valuable addition to an e-commerce website built with WooCommerce. This module enhances the user experience by providing a compact and easily accessible summary of the shopping cart’s contents.

The Mini Cart module improves the user experience by giving customers easy access to their shopping cart’s contents and allowing them to quickly review, edit, and proceed to checkout. It provides a streamlined and convenient way to manage items in the cart and enhances the overall shopping experience on e-commerce websites.

👉 Quick Checkout [PRO]

The Quick Checkout WooCommerce module is designed to streamline the online shopping and checkout process for customers on e-commerce websites using WooCommerce. This module aims to reduce friction and make the checkout experience faster and more efficient.

The module often condenses the traditional multi-step checkout process into a single page, allowing customers to complete the entire checkout process more quickly.

The Quick Checkout WooCommerce module is an effective tool for reducing cart abandonment rates and increasing conversion rates. By simplifying and speeding up the checkout process, it offers customers a more user-friendly and efficient shopping experience, ultimately boosting sales and customer satisfaction on e-commerce websites.

👉 Multi-Step Checkout [PRO]

The Multi-Step Checkout module for WooCommerce is enhances the checkout process on e-commerce websites using WooCommerce. This module reorganizes the traditional single-page checkout into a series of step-by-step forms or pages, making the process more manageable and user-friendly.

The module divides the checkout process into a series of sequential steps or pages, each focusing on a specific aspect of the checkout, such as shipping, billing, payment, and order review.

The Multi-Step Checkout module for WooCommerce offers a structured and user-friendly approach to the checkout process, providing customers with a clear path to completing their orders. It can help reduce cart abandonment rates, improve the customer experience, and ultimately lead to higher conversion rates and increased sales on e-commerce websites.

👉 Product Size Chart [PRO]

This module provides customers with access to detailed information about product sizes and measurements, which is especially valuable for businesses that sell clothing, footwear, or other products where size accuracy is crucial. These charts provide comprehensive information about various size options, such as clothing sizes (e.g., S, M, L, XL), shoe sizes, or any other relevant measurements.

Size charts are typically presented on product pages, allowing customers to easily access sizing information while shopping.

🏆 Build Woocommerce Single product page using ShopBuilder addon

👉 Product Title

Customize the product titles of the product detail page in your WooCommerce store using the Product Title WooCommerce Builder Widget. You have the flexibility to customize the title to your preferences, including altering the style, color, and tags.

👉 Product Description

Customizable Product Descriptions using the Shopbuilder Woocommerce Product Description widget. This widget provides additional capabilities and customization options for product descriptions, allowing store owners to create a more engaging and informative shopping experience.

👉 Product Images

This widget provides additional capabilities and customization options for showcasing product images, allowing store owners to create a more visually appealing and engaging shopping experience. This also include options for changing image size, style, border, and more.

Documentation

👉 Sale Flash – Onsale

By using the Sale Flash – Onsale Widget in Elementor for WooCommerce, store owners can draw attention to products that are currently on sale, helping to boost sales and engage customers more effectively. The customization options allow for a seamless integration with the website’s design and user experience.

👉 Additional Information

You can showcase the product additional information using the ShopBuilder Additonal Information widget. Customize the information to your preferences using the versatility of Elementor.

👉 Product Price

Customize the product price using the ShopBuilder Elementor widget. You can easily adjust the style and positioning of the price according to your preferences.

👉 Product Rating

WooCommerce product ratings and reviews are a valuable tool for both customers and store owners. You can easily adjust the style and positioning of the Preduct review and rating according to your preferences.

👉 Product Stock

You can display the available stock of the product using the ShopBuilder Product Stock Elementor widget.You can easily adjust the style and positioning of the Preduct stock according to your preferences.

👉 Add to Cart

The “Add to Cart” Elementor widget provides store owners with the flexibility to design and style the “Add to Cart” button, allowing for seamless integration with the website’s design and user experience. You can customize the appearance, style, and layout of the “Add to Cart” button, including button text, colors, size, and typography. This can enhance the aesthetics and functionality of the online store, potentially leading to increased customer engagement and conversions.

Documentation

👉 Product Share

The widget includes social sharing buttons that enable customers to share product details, images, and links on various social media platforms, including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, and more.

Customers can share product information through email by clicking on an “Email” or “Share via Email” button, allowing them to send the product details to friends or contacts.

Documentation

👉 Sales Count

By using Sales Count Elementor widget you can showcase the no of sales of the product. This widget provides a visual representation of a product’s popularity and can influence customer trust and purchasing decisions. The widget allows store administrators to display the number of product sales or purchases, often in the form of a numerical count.

Documentation

👉 Flash Sale Countdown

The Flash Sale Countdown Elementor widget adds a countdown timer to product pages in an online store created with WooCommerce. This widget is typically used to create a sense of urgency and encourage customers to make a purchase by highlighting a limited-time sale or promotion. The widget displays a timer that counts down to the end of a flash sale or promotion, showing the remaining hours, minutes, and seconds.

Documentation

👉 Size Chart

You can display size charts or measurement guides for products using the ShopBuilder Size Chart widget. This widget allows store owners to provide detailed sizing information to customers, which is particularly important for products where size accuracy is crucial, such as clothing, footwear, or other similar items.

Documentation

👉 Product Tabs

Customize the Product detail description using the ShopBuilder Elementor widget using tab format. These tabs provide a structured way to organize and present various product details, such as descriptions, specifications, reviews, and additional information. Store owner can add content to each tab, including text, images, videos, and other media, to provide comprehensive product information.

Documentation

👉 Product Reviews

Reviews and ratings play a pivotal role in building trust and encouraging potential buyers to make informed purchasing decisions. This widget provides a way to showcase and interact with customer feedback, allowing potential buyers to make informed purchasing decisions.

Documentation

👉 Upsell Product Widgets

By using the Upsell product widget You can easily add and customize the upsell product in the single product page to encourage customers to purchase related or complementary products when they are viewing a specific product. These widgets are designed to increase sales by showcasing products that complement the customer’s current selection or entice them to buy higher-value items.

Documentation

👉 Related Product Widgets

By using the Related product widget You can easily add related product in the single product page to encourage customers to purchase related or complementary products when they are viewing a specific product. These widgets are designed to increase sales by showcasing products that complement the customer’s current selection or entice them to buy higher-value items.

Documentation

🏆 Build Woocommerce Cart Page using ShopBuilder Cart widgets

👉 Cart Table

With the Shopbuilder Elementor Cart Table widget, you have the …
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for ‘ShopBuilder’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select shopbuilder.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download shopbuilder.zip
  2. Extract the shopbuilder directory to your computer
  3. Upload the shopbuilder directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
How to Use ShopBuilder Plugin

  • Go to ShopBuilder > Templates Builder
  • Create a WooCommerce Template.
  • Edit the template with Elementor as per your need.

Can I use ShopBuilder plugin with any theme?

  • Yes you can use this plugin with any popular theme. Also, you can easily provide compatibility with any theme with our template hooks. If you face any issues, please email our support so that we can help.

Does this plugin support multi-language?

  • Yes our ShopBuilder plugin supports multi-language.

Need Any Help?

  • For any bug, support or suggestion, please submit your ticket here.
sections.changelog:
2.1.9 ( April 07, 2024 )

  • Fix: Addressed a module security issue.
  • Fix: Resolved visibility support for out of stock products.
  • Fix: Rectified auto-redirection bug in the Quick View.
  • Fix: Corrected pagination issues on the template pages.
  • Fix: Resolved an HTML validation issue.
  • Update: Product pagination with visible range support.

2.1.8 ( March 29, 2024 )

  • Add: Compatibility with new module and features.
  • Add: Global styles for Quick View modal.
  • Fix: Outdated notice for WooCommerce templates.
  • Fix: Addressed sanitization and nonce validation issues.
  • Fix: Resolved PHP deprecation issues.
  • Fix: Wishlist icon displaying issue during AJAX calls.
  • Fix: Display issue with the first field in the compare table.
  • Fix: Support for Variation Swatch in cart widgets.
  • Fix: Quantity button support for individually sold products.
  • Fix: Issue with Quick View icon.
  • Fix: Resolved various CSS issues.

2.1.7 ( March 06, 2024 )

  • Add: Compatibility with the B2BKing plugin.
  • Fix: Sale price color inconsistency in Elementor widget.
  • Fix: Addressed some translation issues.
  • Fix: Resolved template caching problems.
  • Fix: Corrected style inconsistencies.

2.1.6 ( February 28, 2024 )

  • Add: Notice templates.
  • Add: Introduced new settings for cart and checkout widgets.
  • Add: Included an option to hide the wishlist icon for guest users.
  • Add: Ensured compatibility with the WooCommerce Address Book plugin.
  • Add: Implemented responsive controls for various table widgets.
  • Fix: Addressed compatibility issues with the WooCommerce notice system.
  • Fix: Resolved some Elementor class selector discrepancies.
  • Fix: Corrected numerous style issues.
  • Fix: Resolved checkout order-review widget problem.
  • Fix: Rectified product slider animation glitches.
  • Fix: Addressed some translation issues.
  • Fix: Resolved caching issues to optimize performance.
  • Enhancement: Backend security system with authorization.
  • Update: General Notice widget for improved functionality.

2.1.5 ( February 15, 2024 )

  • Add: Compatibility with Product Badge module.
  • Fix: Corrected default value saving mechanism.
  • Fix: Resolved Template Builder API issue in offline mode.
  • Fix: Addressed some CSS issues.
  • Fix: Resolved some caching issues.

2.1.4 ( February 07, 2024 )

  • Fix: Resolved a critical PHP error.

2.1.3 ( February 06, 2024 )

  • Fix: Resolved Checkout page 500 error issue.
  • Fix: Addressed a PHP warning regarding an undefined index.
  • Fix: Resolved Cart page shipping calculation issue.
  • Fix: Ensured Add to Cart button markup validation.
  • Fix: Corrected various text-domain issues.
  • Update: Enhanced Elementor render system and conducted code cleanups.
  • Optimization: Optimized and reduced the size of the frontend JS file for improved performance.

2.1.2 ( January 26, 2024 )

  • Add: Archive variable product Ajax add to cart.
  • Add: Toaster notification hide settings.
  • Fix: Shop page URL issue.
  • Fix: Unicode conversion issue.
  • Fix: Notice widget style issues.
  • Fix: Cart table product image not showing issues.
  • Fix: Cart table style issues.
  • Fix: Checkout registration restriction issue.
  • Fix: Checkout login form widget issue.
  • Fix: Checkout coupon form widget issue.
  • Update: Notice system.
  • Tweak: Ordering & result count templates.

2.1.1 ( January 19, 2024 )

  • Add: Admin ‘Get Help’ page.
  • Add: Admin review notice.
  • Add: Some new widget controls.
  • Fix: Translation issues.
  • Fix: Compatibility with WoodMart theme.
  • Fix: Some caching issues.
  • Tweak: Global admin CSS optimization.
  • Tweak: Elementor rendering optimization.
  • Tweak: HTML tag validation.
  • Tweak: Some complex functionalities’ optimization.
  • Tweak: Admin notice functionality.

2.1.0 ( January 05, 2024 )

  • Fix: Removed unused data attributes from widgets.
  • Fix: Product counting issue in tags.
  • Fix: Some template builder issues.
  • Fix: Some layout CSS issues.
  • Add: Dummy product creation if no products created.
  • Tweak: Update product queries for performance enhancement.
  • Tweak: Lots of functions optimize for better performance.
  • Performance: Update and optimize database queries.
  • Performance: Remove lots of duplicate database queries.
  • Performance: Implement advanced caching mechanism.
  • Performance: Editor preview page optimization.

2.0.3 ( December 01, 2023 )

  • Fix: Editor slider height issue.
  • Fix: Variation swatches compatibility issue.
  • Fix: Some CSS selectors issue.
  • Fix: Some Style issues.
  • Update: Swiper library.
  • Tweak: Swiper JS conditional loading.

2.0.2 ( November 17, 2023 )

  • Add: Admin notice.
  • Fix: Product view mode & sorting compatibility.

2.0.1 ( November 13, 2023 )

  • Add: RTL Support.
  • Add: Elementor Custom Breakpoints Support.
  • Fix: Custom widget support for all product types.
  • Fix: Quick View Gallery issue.
  • Fix: Billing/Shipping Form Issue.
  • Fix: Some Style issues.

2.0.0 ( November 03, 2023 )

  • Add: New Templates
  • Add: New Widgets
  • Add: Compatibility with PHP 8.2
  • Add: Compatibility with WooCommerce HPOS
  • Add: New Field types Repeater, File Upload.
  • Fix: Some PHP errors
  • Fix: Wishlist Page issue fixed.
  • Fix: Wishlist Notification Url Fix.
  • Fix: Astra theme support
  • Update: Template Import System
  • Enhancement: Many under the hood optimisations

  • Fix: Translation issues.

sections.reviews:
I bought the pluggin : it s not finished, lot of bugs

By rubiwane on April 15, 2024

After months of use to achieve a reasonable result, here is what I remember:

  • it is not a multilingual plugin, so it is impossible to have a shop other than in English, because of this, I do not use any functionality of the paid plugin
  • the css of filters in mobile are chaotic
  • the plugin significantly slows down the site

Absolutely unique product

By codeorlov on January 26, 2024

I strongly recommend this solution for creating unique design for your next WooCommerce store. In comparison with alternatives - ShopBuilder is the best. Support is amazing and fast. Thanks for this plugin!

Flexible & clean code

By webangon on March 21, 2023

Top notch code quality

It is exactly what I am looking for, Great plugin, works exactly as expected.

By Mahabub Hasan (mahabub hasan) on March 9, 2023

I love this plugin. It’s simple but exactly what I was looking for. Easy install, quick response from the developer. Finally, an easy way to monetize my Shop.

short_description: WooCommerce builder for Elementor includes 80+ widgets, WooCommerce templates, quick view, compare, wishlist, shop & archive page builder and more.

👉 Flash Sale Countdown [PRO]

The “Flash Sale Countdown” module for WooCommerce adds a sense of urgency and excitement to an e-commerce website built with WooCommerce. The Flash Sale Countdown module for WooCommerce is an effective tool for boosting sales and engaging customers by creating a sense of limited-time opportunity. It helps online store owners leverage flash sales as a marketing strategy to attract and convert customers, ultimately increasing revenue and promoting a dynamic shopping experience.

👉 Mini Cart [PRO]

The WooCommerce Mini Cart module is a valuable addition to an e-commerce website built with WooCommerce. This module enhances the user experience by providing a compact and easily accessible summary of the shopping cart’s contents.

The Mini Cart module improves the user experience by giving customers easy access to their shopping cart’s contents and allowing them to quickly review, edit, and proceed to checkout. It provides a streamlined and convenient way to manage items in the cart and enhances the overall shopping experience on e-commerce websites.

👉 Quick Checkout [PRO]

The Quick Checkout WooCommerce module is designed to streamline the online shopping and checkout process for customers on e-commerce websites using WooCommerce. This module aims to reduce friction and make the checkout experience faster and more efficient.

The module often condenses the traditional multi-step checkout process into a single page, allowing customers to complete the entire checkout process more quickly.

The Quick Checkout WooCommerce module is an effective tool for reducing cart abandonment rates and increasing conversion rates. By simplifying and speeding up the checkout process, it offers customers a more user-friendly and efficient shopping experience, ultimately boosting sales and customer satisfaction on e-commerce websites.

👉 Multi-Step Checkout [PRO]

The Multi-Step Checkout module for WooCommerce is enhances the checkout process on e-commerce websites using WooCommerce. This module reorganizes the traditional single-page checkout into a series of step-by-step forms or pages, making the process more manageable and user-friendly.

The module divides the checkout process into a series of sequential steps or pages, each focusing on a specific aspect of the checkout, such as shipping, billing, payment, and order review.

The Multi-Step Checkout module for WooCommerce offers a structured and user-friendly approach to the checkout process, providing customers with a clear path to completing their orders. It can help reduce cart abandonment rates, improve the customer experience, and ultimately lead to higher conversion rates and increased sales on e-commerce websites.

👉 Product Size Chart [PRO]

This module provides customers with access to detailed information about product sizes and measurements, which is especially valuable for businesses that sell clothing, footwear, or other products where size accuracy is crucial. These charts provide comprehensive information about various size options, such as clothing sizes (e.g., S, M, L, XL), shoe sizes, or any other relevant measurements.

Size charts are typically presented on product pages, allowing customers to easily access sizing information while shopping.
